name: Rhino Puzzle
description:
Story:

3d puzzle game which location is old style castle. Player need finish different puzzles to open doors and go forward. There are several puzzles which needs jumping skills, good memory and fast speed. Castle also include several traps like moving spikes, moving fires and saws which hurt player. If player dies he need start game from starting point. Also by collecting skulls player get steam achievements. So use your brain and jumping skills to finish game

Features:

- 1 map with puzzles
- Several puzzles which need accurate jumping, good memory and jumping skills
- Steam achievements
- Different traps which hurt player
